snippet: As lawmakers prepared to serve 20 subpoenas, Gov. Chris Christie hired a lawyer to conduct an internal investigation of his office following the orchestrated lane closings on the George Washington Bridge.
abstract: Gov Chris Christie hires lawyer to conduct internal investigation of his office following orchestrated lane closings on George Washington Bridge, as lawmakers prepared to serve 20 subpoenas; hiring raises questions about whether Christie will cooperate with Legislature's inquiry.

byline.contributor: Eli M. Rosenberg contributed reporting from Manahawkin, N.J.

lead_paragraph: As lawmakers prepared to serve 20 subpoenas, Gov. Chris Christie hired a lawyer to conduct an internal investigation of his office following the orchestrated lane closings on the George Washington Bridge.

headline.main: A Hiring by Christie Raises Questions Over Cooperation
headline.print_headline: A Hiring by Christie Raises Questions Over Cooperation
